name: Robs and Cops
description:
Robs and Cops is an exciting new twist on the popular game Among Us. 

In this version, players take on the roles of cops and robbers in a prison setting. 

The cops must work together to complete their tasks before the robber can steal all the diamonds that have been stashed away. 

With added tension and strategy, Robs and Cops is sure to be an engaging and thrilling experience for all players. 

This game offers a new level of excitement to the popular party game genre and will keep players on the edge of their seats. 

It's perfect for those who want to experience new and unique gameplay while still having the familiarity of the original game.
